LanguageData.ROMCH_FillingPit: {0} is going to fill the pit.
LanguageData.ROM_TradedSanityLossForMadness: {0} succumbed to a mental break, however, this has restored their sanity.
LanguageData.ROM_TradedSanityLossForMadnessFailed: {0} failed to enter a mental break. Try again?
LanguageData.cosmicHorrorEventsDelayObject: Delay monster events by this many days
LanguageData.cosmicHorrorEventsDelayObjectDesc: This setting will delay cosmic horror incidents by x many days.
LanguageData.CosmicHorrorRaidIncidentDesc: Something otherworldly is stalking your colonists.
LanguageData.StarVampireIncidentMessage: In the distance a tittering laugh is heard, mocking and inhuman. Something is coming.
LanguageData.StarVampireIncidentMessage2: The tittering laugh is heard once again, mocking and inhuman. Prepare quickly.
LanguageData.CommandPitSacrificeDesc: Throw a prisoner into the pit to hopefully satisfy the monster.
LanguageData.CommandCancelPitSacrificeDesc: Cancels the pit sacrifice and returns everyone back to their business.
LanguageData.CommandFillHoleActiveDesc: A random colonist will attempt to fill the hole. NOTE: The pit is currently ACTIVE and this is HIGHLY not recommended!
LanguageData.CommandFillHoleDesc: A random colonist will attempt to fill the hole.
LanguageData.ChthonianPitActivityStopped: The pit has ceased all activity.
LanguageData.CriesFromBelow: {0} can hear human cries from below as {1} shovels into the pit.
LanguageData.ChthonianSacrificeReturnedDesc: Our sacrifice to the pit has oddly returned mostly intact.
